string-array.name: item_desc
string-array.item: Hand sanitizer is a liquid, gel or foam generally used to kill many viruses/bacteria/microorganisms on the hands
Face mask refers to an item of protective equipment that primarily guards the airways
Latex gloves are used during medical procedures to help prevent cross-contamination between caregivers and patients
Face shield is intended to protect the partial or entire face and the eyes from hazards
First aid kit or medical kit is a collection of supplies and equipment used to give immediate medical treatment
Allows for minor wound dressings without professional assistance
An antiseptic is an antimicrobial substance that is applied to living tissue to reduce the possibility of sepsis and infection
A thermometer is a device that measures temperature or a temperature gradient
Cotton buds are wads of cotton wrapped around a short rod made of wood, rolled paper, or plastic
